text: We’ve reworked this limit to help a bit with this. There is now a per-app limit on how many lists can be created on a portal in a 24-hour period, it is higher than the previous per-user limit. More details will be coming up in updates to the Lists API documentation.
Per-app limit: meaning that the limit is now limits the number of lists an app can create in a single portal in a 24-hour period. (vs. previously the limit was tied to the user that auth’d the app.)
So what is the limit per day?

It’s complicated, not all lists are weighted the same. I’m deferring to upcoming lists documentation for specifics, as I don’t want to state anything here that’s going to be misleading. cc: <@U05Q2R4ESCA>
any way to adjust the API so that instead of a failure, it just lists that step as needing an update?
that way it is in line with how it behaves elsewhere?
